entry.title: WINTER STORM WATCH, Wynyard
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:50 a.m. CST Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of rain. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of rain beginning this morning. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming east 50 gusting to 70 near noon. High plus 5. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CST Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow or rain. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Rain changing to snow this evening. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 2. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CST Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow at times heavy. Temperature steady near minus 2.
